message:
‚Äã‚ÄãWhat if I‚Äôd like to study at NaUKMA as an international student?

For our international students NaUKMA offers one Master's program taught in English ‚ÄúManagement in Healthcare‚Äù.
As for Ukrainian-taught programmes, you can be admitted to any Bachelor‚Äôs programme, except 061 ‚ÄúPublic Relations‚Äù and 291 ‚ÄúInternational relations‚Äù, and to any Master‚Äôs programme.

What do you need to come to NaUKMA as an international student?

üìå If you would like to apply to a programme taught in Ukrainian, you need to:
- submit the filled-in application form (you can find it on our website);
- submit an application package (please visit our website to get the list of all the documents you have to provide);
- sit a few online interviews (Ukrainian language and two subject interviews for Bachelor‚Äôs programme; Ukrainian, English languages and specialty for Master‚Äôs programme).

üìå If you would like to apply to the programme taught in English, you need to:
- submit the filled-in application form (you can find it here);
- submit an application package (please visit our website to get the list of all the documents you have to provide);
- sit two online interviews (English language and General Principles of Public Healthcare and Public Health Management).

‚ùóÔ∏èPlease be aware that you have to receive an invitation letter for the D-type visa to enter Ukraine. The invitation can be issued only upon review of your application package submitted and preliminary online interview. 

‚ùìIf you have any questions or would like to get any additional information, visit our website or you can sign up for online consultation (please fill out the registration form). University administration will contact you via Zoom, WhatsApp, Viber, Facebook, or mobile phone (if you are in Ukraine) so that you could clarify all the details.
